## recordClassType() function

Creates a run-time type for a record class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function recordClassType<T extends RecordObject<Props, Data> & Equatable & Readonly<Props>, Props, Data>(lazy: () => RecordConstructor<Props, Data> & {
    new (input: Props | Data): T;
}): Type<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lazy | () =&gt; [RecordConstructor](./paratype.recordconstructor.md)<!-- -->&lt;Props, Data&gt; &amp; { new (input: Props \| Data): T; } |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Type](./paratype.type.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
